12 nimbus::Recognition::Recognition(ros::NodeHandle nh, const std::string path): _path(path), _features(nh, 0.01, 0.01, 0.01), _nh(nh)
13 {
14  pubPose = _nh.advertise<geometry_msgs::TransformStamped>("/iiwa/detected_pose", 5);

19 void nimbus::Recognition::constructModelParam()
20 {
21  _model.resize(10);
22  _model_normals.resize(10);
23  _model_keypoints.resize(10);
24  _model_description.resize(10);
25  _model_board.resize(10);
26  // ToDo: Change the fixed number of *.pcd file to for loop
27 
28  for(int i = 0; i < 10; i++)
29  {
30  _model[i].reset(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI>());
31  _model_normals[i].reset(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::Normal>());
32  _model_keypoints[i].reset(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI>());
33  _model_description[i].reset(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::SHOT352>());
34  _model_board[i].reset(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::ReferenceFrame>());
35 
36  typename pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI>::Ptr blob (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI>());
37  std::stringstream model_path;
38  model_path << _path << "/box_";
39  model_path << std::to_string(i+1) << ".pcd";
40  pcl::io::loadPCDFile(model_path.str(), *blob);
41  pcl::copyPointCloud(*blob, *_model[i]);
42  _features.extraction(blob);
43 
44  _model_keypoints[i] = _features.keypoints;
45  _model_normals[i] = _features.normals;
46  _model_description[i] = _features.descriptor;
47  _model_board[i] = _features.board;
48  }
49 }
50 
51 void nimbus::Recognition::correspondences(const pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI>::ConstPtr blob)
52 {
53  // Call model contructor before this.
54  _features.extraction(blob);
55  model_scene_corr.resize(_model_description.size());
56  for(int j = 0; j < _model_description.size(); j++)
57  {
58  model_scene_corr[j].reset(new pcl::Correspondences());
59  pcl::KdTreeFLANN<pcl::SHOT352> match_search;
60  match_search.setInputCloud(_model_description[j]);
61  for(std::size_t i = 0; i < _features.descriptor->size(); i++)
62  {
63  std::vector<int> neigh_indices(1);
64  std::vector<float> neigh_sqrt_distance(1);
65 
66  if(! std::isfinite(_features.descriptor->at(i).descriptor[0])){
67  continue;
68  }
69 
70  int found_neighs = match_search.nearestKSearch(_features.descriptor->at(i), 1, neigh_indices, neigh_sqrt_distance);
71  if(found_neighs == 1 && neigh_sqrt_distance[0] < 0.25f)
72  {
73  pcl::Correspondence corr(neigh_indices[0], static_cast<int> (i), neigh_sqrt_distance[0]);
74  model_scene_corr[j]->push_back(corr);
75  }
76  }
77  // std::cout << "Correspondences found at: " << j << "= " << model_scene_corr[j]->size () << std::endl;
78  }
79 }
80 
81 void nimbus::Recognition::cloudHough3D(const pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI>::ConstPtr blob)
82 {
83  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI>::Ptr cloud (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI>());
84  pcl::copyPointCloud(*blob, *cloud);
85  this->correspondences(cloud);
86 
87  std::vector<Eigen::Matrix4f, Eigen::aligned_allocator<Eigen::Matrix4f> > trasformations;
88  std::vector<pcl::Correspondences> clusters;
89 
90  std::vector<Eigen::Matrix4f, Eigen::aligned_allocator<Eigen::Matrix4f> > rototranslations;
91  std::vector<pcl::Correspondences> clustered_corrs;
92 
93  pcl::Hough3DGrouping<pcl::PointXYZI, pcl::PointXYZI, pcl::ReferenceFrame, pcl::ReferenceFrame> clusterer;
94  for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++)
95  {
96  clusterer.setHoughBinSize (0.017);
97  clusterer.setHoughThreshold (2.2);
98  clusterer.setUseInterpolation (true);
99  clusterer.setUseDistanceWeight (false);
100 
101  clusterer.setInputCloud (_model_keypoints[i]);
102  clusterer.setInputRf (_model_board[i]);
103  clusterer.setSceneCloud (_features.keypoints);
104  clusterer.setSceneRf (_features.board);
105  clusterer.setModelSceneCorrespondences (model_scene_corr[i]);
106 
107  clusterer.recognize (rototranslations, clustered_corrs);
108  if (rototranslations.size() > 0){
109  std::cout << "The model is recognized for Correspondences size: " << model_scene_corr[i]->size () << " at: " << i << std::endl;
110  std::vector<pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI>::ConstPtr> instances;
111  for(std::size_t j = 0; j < rototranslations.size(); ++j)
112  {
113  std::vector<int> indices;
114  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI>::Ptr rotated_model (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI>());
115  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI>::Ptr modelNoNaN (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI>());
116  pcl::removeNaNFromPointCloud(*_model[i], *modelNoNaN, indices);
117  modelNoNaN->is_dense = false;
118  pcl::transformPointCloud(*modelNoNaN, *rotated_model, rototranslations[j]);
119  instances.push_back(rotated_model);
120  trasformations.push_back(rototranslations[j]);
121  clusters.push_back(clustered_corrs[j]);
122  }
123  this->registrationICP(instances, cloud, rototranslations, clusters);
124  }
125  }
126 }
127 
128 void nimbus::Recognition::registrationICP (const std::vector<pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI>::ConstPtr> instances,
129  const pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI>::ConstPtr scene,
130  std::vector<Eigen::Matrix4f, Eigen::aligned_allocator<Eigen::Matrix4f> > rototranslations,
131  std::vector<pcl::Correspondences> clustered_corrs)
132 {
134  std::vector<Eigen::Matrix4f, Eigen::aligned_allocator<Eigen::Matrix4f>> rototransList;
135  std::vector<pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI>::ConstPtr> registered_instances;
136  std::vector<int> indices;
137  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI>::Ptr cloud (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI>());
138  pcl::removeNaNFromPointCloud(*scene, *cloud, indices);
139  cloud->is_dense = false;
140  for(std::size_t i = 0; i < rototranslations.size(); ++i)
141  {
142  Eigen::Matrix4f icp_tf;
143  Eigen::Matrix4f icp_final_tf;
144  pcl::IterativeClosestPoint<pcl::PointXYZI, pcl::PointXYZI> icp;
145  icp.setMaximumIterations(5);
146  icp.setMaxCorrespondenceDistance(0.025f);
147  icp.setTransformationEpsilon(1e-7);
148  icp.setInputTarget(cloud);
149  icp.setInputSource(instances[i]);
150  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI>::Ptr registered (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI>());
151  icp.align(*registered);
152  registered_instances.push_back(registered);
153  icp_tf = icp.getFinalTransformation();
154  // ToDo Why?
155  icp_final_tf = icp_tf * rototranslations[i];
156  // if(icp.hasConverged()){
157  // ROS_ERROR("!Alligned!");
158  // }else{
159  // ROS_ERROR("!NOT Alligned!");
160  // }
161  rototransList.push_back(icp_final_tf);
162  }
163  this->hypothesisVerification(cloud, registered_instances, rototransList);
164 }
165 
166 void nimbus::Recognition::hypothesisVerification(const pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI>::ConstPtr blob,
167  std::vector<pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI>::ConstPtr> registered_instances,
168  std::vector<Eigen::Matrix4f, Eigen::aligned_allocator<Eigen::Matrix4f> > rototranslations)
169 {
170  std::vector<bool> mask;
171  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI>::Ptr scene (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI>);
172  pcl::copyPointCloud(*blob, *scene);
173 
174  pcl::GlobalHypothesesVerification<pcl::PointXYZI, pcl::PointXYZI> GoHv;
175  GoHv.setSceneCloud(scene);
176  GoHv.addModels(registered_instances, true);
177  GoHv.setResolution(0.005);
178  GoHv.setOcclusionThreshold(0.01);
179  GoHv.setInlierThreshold(0.005);
180  GoHv.setOcclusionThreshold(0.01);
181  GoHv.setRegularizer(3.0);
182  GoHv.setRadiusClutter(0.03);
183  GoHv.setClutterRegularizer(5.0);
184  GoHv.setDetectClutter(true);
185  GoHv.setRadiusNormals(0.05);
186  GoHv.verify();
187  GoHv.getMask(mask);
188  this->publishPose(mask, rototranslations);
189 }
190 
191 void nimbus::Recognition::publishPose(std::vector<bool> mask, std::vector<Eigen::Matrix4f, Eigen::aligned_allocator<Eigen::Matrix4f> > rototranslations)
192 {
193  for(int i = 0; i < mask.size(); i++)
194  {
195  if(mask[i])
196  {
197  std::cout << "Instance " << i << " is GOOD! <---" << std::endl;
198  Eigen::Matrix3f rotation = rototranslations[i].block<3,3>(0,0);
199  Eigen::Vector3f translation = rototranslations[i].block<3,1>(0, 3);
200  tf2::Matrix3x3 mat(rotation (0,0), rotation (0,1), rotation (0,2),
201  rotation (1,0), rotation (1,1), rotation (1,2),
202  rotation (2,0), rotation (2,1), rotation (2,2));
203  tf2Scalar roll, pitch, yaw;
204  mat.getEulerYPR(yaw, pitch, roll);
205  tf2::Quaternion q;
206  q.setRPY(roll, pitch, yaw);
207  ROS_WARN("Position X: %f, Y: %f Z: %f", (float)translation(0), (float)translation(1), (float)translation(2));
208  ROS_WARN("Rotation Roll: %f, Pitch: %f yaw: %f", (float)roll * (180 / M_PI), (float)pitch * (180 / M_PI), (float)yaw * (180 / M_PI));
209  pose.header.frame_id = "camera";
210  pose.child_frame_id = "object";
211  pose.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
212  pose.transform.translation.x = translation(0);
213  pose.transform.translation.y = translation(1);
214  pose.transform.translation.z = translation(2);
215  pose.transform.rotation = tf2::toMsg(q);
216  pubPose.publish(pose);
217  tfb.sendTransform(pose);
218  ros::Duration(5.0).sleep();
219  }
220  else{
221  // std::cout << "Instance " << i << " is bad!" << std::endl;
222  }
223  }
224 }
225 
226 void nimbus::Recognition::visualization (const int num,
227  const pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI>::Ptr scene,
228  std::vector<Eigen::Matrix4f, Eigen::aligned_allocator<Eigen::Matrix4f> > rototranslations,
229  std::vector<pcl::Correspondences> clustered_corrs){
230  pcl::visualization::PCLVisualizer viewer("Correspondence");
231  viewer.addPointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI> (scene, "scene_cloud");
232 
233  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI>::Ptr off_scene_model (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI> ());
234  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI>::Ptr off_scene_model_keypoints (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI> ());
235 
236  pcl::transformPointCloud(*_model[num], *off_scene_model, Eigen::Vector3f (-1,0,0), Eigen::Quaternionf (1, 0, 0, 0));
237  pcl::transformPointCloud (*_model_keypoints[num], *off_scene_model_keypoints, Eigen::Vector3f (-1,0,0), Eigen::Quaternionf (1, 0, 0, 0));
238 
239  pcl::visualization::PointCloudColorHandlerCustom<pcl::PointXYZI> off_scene_model_color_handler (off_scene_model, 255, 255, 128);
240  viewer.addPointCloud (off_scene_model, off_scene_model_color_handler, "off_scene_model");
241 
242  pcl::visualization::PointCloudColorHandlerCustom<pcl::PointXYZI> scene_keypoints_color_handler (_features.keypoints, 0, 0, 255);
243  viewer.addPointCloud (_features.keypoints, scene_keypoints_color_handler, "scene_keypoints");
244  viewer.setPointCloudRenderingProperties (pcl::visualization::PCL_VISUALIZER_POINT_SIZE, 5, "scene_keypoints");
245 
246  pcl::visualization::PointCloudColorHandlerCustom<pcl::PointXYZI> off_scene_model_keypoints_color_handler (off_scene_model_keypoints, 0, 0, 255);
247  viewer.addPointCloud (off_scene_model_keypoints, off_scene_model_keypoints_color_handler, "off_scene_model_keypoints");
248  viewer.setPointCloudRenderingProperties (pcl::visualization::PCL_VISUALIZER_POINT_SIZE, 5, "off_scene_model_keypoints");
249 
250  for(std::size_t i = 0; i < rototranslations.size(); i++)
251  {
252  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI>::Ptr rotated_model (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI>());
253  pcl::transformPointCloud (*_model[num], *rotated_model, rototranslations[i]);
254 
255  std::stringstream ss_cloud;
256  ss_cloud << "instance" << i;
257 
258  pcl::visualization::PointCloudColorHandlerCustom<pcl::PointXYZI> rotated_model_color_handler (rotated_model, 255, 0, 0);
259  viewer.addPointCloud (rotated_model, rotated_model_color_handler, ss_cloud.str ());
260 
261  for (std::size_t j = 0; j < clustered_corrs[i].size (); ++j)
262  {
263  std::stringstream ss_line;
264  ss_line << "correspondence_line" << i << "_" << j;
265  pcl::PointXYZI& model_point = off_scene_model_keypoints->at (clustered_corrs[i][j].index_query);
266  pcl::PointXYZI& scene_point = _features.keypoints->at (clustered_corrs[i][j].index_match);
267 
268  // We are drawing a line for each pair of clustered correspondences found between the model and the scene
269  viewer.addLine<pcl::PointXYZI, pcl::PointXYZI> (model_point, scene_point, 0, 255, 0, ss_line.str ());
270  }
271  }
272  viewer.spinOnce(10000, false);
273 }
